title: 5 of the 13 states voted for ratification - cause

content.question: Five of the thirteen states voted for ratification of the Constitution only after

choices.label: slavery was allowed to continue without federal interference
several slave revolts rocked the Carolinas and Virginia
they were assured that the Supreme Court would have the power of judicial review
they were assured that a Bill of Rights would be added shortly after ratification
the other states threatened to organize the government without them

content.answer: they were assured that a Bill of Rights would be added shortly after ratification
